TargetEndpoint.name: ig3

PreFlow.Request:
OauthV2.VerifyAccessToken
FlowCallout.ExtendedAttributes
FlowCallout.ApplyRateLimiting
AssignMessage.SetAccessModeApplicationRestricted
AssignMessage.SetAccessModeUserRestricted (scope JavaRegex "(.+\ urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-id:aal3:personal-demographics-service\ .+|^urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-id:aal3:personal-demographics-service\ .+|.+\ urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-id:aal3:personal-demographics-service$|^urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-id:aal3:personal-demographics-service$|.+\ urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-cis2:aal3:personal-demographics-service\ .+|^urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-cis2:aal3:personal-demographics-service\ .+|.+\ urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-cis2:aal3:personal-demographics-service$|^urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-cis2:aal3:personal-demographics-service$|.+\ personal-demographics-service:USER-RESTRICTED\ .+|^personal-demographics-service:USER-RESTRICTED\ .+|.+\ personal-demographics-service:USER-RESTRICTED$|^personal-demographics-service:USER-RESTRICTED$)") or ((scope JavaRegex "(.+\ urn:nhsd:apim:app:level3:personal-demographics-service\ .+|^urn:nhsd:apim:app:level3:personal-demographics-service\ .+|.+\ urn:nhsd:apim:app:level3:personal-demographics-service$|^urn:nhsd:apim:app:level3:personal-demographics-service$)" and apim-app-flow-vars.pds.app-restricted.update Is "true")
AssignMessage.SetAccessModePatientAccess (scope JavaRegex "(.+\ urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-login:P9:personal-demographics-service\ .+|^urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-login:P9:personal-demographics-service\ .+|.+\ urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-login:P9:personal-demographics-service$|^urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-login:P9:personal-demographics-service$)")
RaiseFault.InvalidUserNHSlogin (scope JavaRegex "(.+\ urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-login:P5:personal-demographics-service\ .+|^urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-login:P5:personal-demographics-service\ .+|.+\ urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-login:P5:personal-demographics-service$|^urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-login:P5:personal-demographics-service$|.+\ urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-login:P0:personal-demographics-service\ .+|^urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-login:P0:personal-demographics-service\ .+|.+\ urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-login:P0:personal-demographics-service$|^urn:nhsd:apim:user-nhs-login:P0:personal-demographics-service$)")
RaiseFault.400BadRequest (not proxy.pathsuffix JavaRegex "/Patient[/\?]+.*|/Coverage\??.*|/_poll/.*|/_status|/_ping")
RaiseFault.400BadRequest (original-request-details.header.X-Request-ID != null) and (not original-request-details.header.X-Request-ID ~~ "^[0-9a-fA-F]{8}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{12}$")
AssignMessage.SetShouldHaveUserRoleHeaderFalse
AssignMessage.SetShouldHaveUserRoleHeaderTrue (access-mode Equals "user-restricted") and apim-app-flow-vars.pds.app-restricted.update IsNot "true"
AssignMessage.RemoveUserRoleHeader should-have-user-role-header == "false"
FlowCallout.UserRoleService should-have-user-role-header == "true"
AssignMessage.AddUserIdHeader
AssignMessage.AddIssuerHeader
KeyValueMapOperations.GetSecureVariables
AssignMessage.PopulateAsidFromApp (app.asid IsNot null)
{% if REQUIRE_ASID %}
RaiseFault.400BadRequest (app.asid is null)
{% endif %}
AssignMessage.AddAsidHeader
AssignMessage.Swap.RequestHeaders

Step.Name: AssignMessage.SetMaxResultsToOne
Step.Condition: (proxy.pathsuffix MatchesPath "/Patient" and request.verb Equals "GET" and request.queryparam._max-results Is null)

Step.Name: RaiseFault.MaxResultsInvalidAppRestricted
Step.Condition: (proxy.pathsuffix MatchesPath "/Patient" and request.verb Equals "GET" and request.queryparam._max-results NotEquals "1")

TargetEndpoint.FaultRules:
(sharedFlow.userRoleError is "true")
AssignMessage.Errors.UserRoleSharedFlow
AssignMessage.Errors.CatchAllMessage
oauthV2.OauthV2.VerifyAccessToken.failed
ExtractVariables.OAuthErrorFaultString
javascript.UpdateInvalidAccessTokenFaultString
AssignMessage.Mirror.CorrelationID (original-request-details.header.X-Correlation-ID ~~ ".+")
AssignMessage.Mirror.RequestID (original-request-details.header.X-Request-ID ~~ ".+")
AssignMessage.Errors.OAuthPolicyResponse
(ratelimit.QuotaPerApp.failed Equals true)
AssignMessage.Errors.AppQuotaExceeded
AssignMessage.Mirror.CorrelationID (original-request-details.header.X-Correlation-ID ~~ ".+")
AssignMessage.Mirror.RequestID (original-request-details.header.X-Request-ID ~~ ".+")
AssignMessage.Errors.CatchAllMessage
(ratelimit.SpikeArrestPerApp.failed Equals true)
AssignMessage.Errors.AppSpikeArrestExceeded
AssignMessage.Mirror.CorrelationID (original-request-details.header.X-Correlation-ID ~~ ".+")
AssignMessage.Mirror.RequestID (original-request-details.header.X-Request-ID ~~ ".+")
AssignMessage.Errors.CatchAllMessage
(ratelimit.QuotaPerProxy.failed Equals true OR ratelimit.SpikeArrestPerProxy.failed Equals true)
AssignMessage.Errors.ProxyRatelimitExceeded
AssignMessage.Mirror.CorrelationID (original-request-details.header.X-Correlation-ID ~~ ".+")
AssignMessage.Mirror.RequestID (original-request-details.header.X-Request-ID ~~ ".+")
AssignMessage.Errors.CatchAllMessage
(not proxy.pathsuffix JavaRegex "/Patient[/\?]+.*") and (not proxy.pathsuffix JavaRegex "/Coverage\??.*")
AssignMessage.Errors.UnsupportedRequest
AssignMessage.Mirror.CorrelationID (original-request-details.header.X-Correlation-ID ~~ ".+")
AssignMessage.Mirror.RequestID (original-request-details.header.X-Request-ID ~~ ".+")
AssignMessage.Errors.CatchAllMessage
(original-request-details.header.X-Request-ID != null) and (not original-request-details.header.X-Request-ID ~~ "^[0-9a-fA-F]{8}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{12}$")
AssignMessage.Errors.InvalidRequestID
AssignMessage.Mirror.CorrelationID (original-request-details.header.X-Correlation-ID ~~ ".+")
AssignMessage.Mirror.RequestID (original-request-details.header.X-Request-ID ~~ ".+")
AssignMessage.Errors.CatchAllMessage
{% if REQUIRE_ASID %}
(app.asid is null)
AssignMessage.Errors.MissingASID
AssignMessage.Mirror.CorrelationID (original-request-details.header.X-Correlation-ID ~~ ".+")
AssignMessage.Mirror.RequestID (original-request-details.header.X-Request-ID ~~ ".+")
AssignMessage.Errors.CatchAllMessage
{% endif %}
